description:
Haru invites Fudo to lunch to try to ask about his suspected girlfriend. But when Desumi spies them together, she can`t help but feel shaken... a feeling that soon shows itself on the battlefield!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Could You Please Tell Me Why?
Kannst du mir den Grund nicht verraten?
Не хочешь мне открыть эту причину?
その理由を聞かせてくれないか?
